en_us.name: Modify Guild MOTD
en_us.description: Change the guild's message of the day.

en_us.name: Change ranks
en_us.description: Promote or demote members (up to their own rank).

en_us.name: Guild Finder options
en_us.description: Change how the guild is shown in the Guild Finder, if at all.

en_us.name: Officer Chat
en_us.description: Send and receive messages in the officer chat.

en_us.name: Change Guild Discord
en_us.description: Change the guild's Discord join link.
